languages.text: {n}Ульфар недоверчиво смотрит на растение.{/n} "Нет, эттфатер. Кто родился на Фенрисе и выучил его суровые уроки, тот нюхом чует опасность. И я говорю: скверная это лоза. Сжечь бы ее — и дело с концом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ульфар недоверчиво смотрит на растение.{/n} "Нет, эттфатер. Кто родился на Фенрисе и выучил его суровые уроки, тот нюхом чует опасность. И я говорю: скверная это лоза. Сжечь бы ее — и дело с концом".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар недоверчиво смотрит на растение.{/n} "Нет, эттфатер. Кто родился на Фенрисе и выучил его суровые уроки, тот нюхом чует опасность. И я говорю: скверная это лоза. Сжечь бы ее — и дело с концом".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar leans over you anxiously and gives you a scrutinizing look.{/n} "Go see a sawbones when you get back on the ship. I think you misheard when I said this thing is a dangerous parasite."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは信じられないといった様子で植物を見ている。{/n}「いや、アエット＝ヴァテル。フェンリスで生まれ、厳しい教訓を得た彼であれば、危険をかぎ取れるだろう。これは有害なつる草だ。燃やして終わりにしてしまおう」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは信じられないといった様子で植物を見ている。{/n}「いや、アエット＝ヴァテル。フェンリスで生まれ、厳しい教訓を得た彼であれば、危険をかぎ取れるだろう。これは有害なつる草だ。燃やして終わりにしてしまおう」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは不安げにこちらを見下ろし、いぶかしげに見てきた。{/n}「船に戻ったら外科医に診てもらえ。こいつは危険な寄生虫だと言ったはずだが、伝わってなかったみたいだな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar mira la planta con desconfianza.{/n} «No, Aett-Vater. Uno que ha nacido en Fenris y aprendido sus crueles lecciones es capaz de oler el peligro. Le digo que esta parra es maligna. Ahórrese un disgusto y quémela».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar mira la planta con desconfianza.{/n} «No, Aett-Vater. Uno que ha nacido en Fenris y aprendido sus crueles lecciones es capaz de oler el peligro. Le digo que esta parra es maligna. Ahórrese un disgusto y quémela».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se inclina sobre ti y te estudia con la mirada.{/n} «Vaya a un matasanos cuando volvamos a la nave y hágase mirar el oído, porque acabo de decirle que esta cosa es un parásito peligroso».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法带着怀疑的目光，看着那株植物。{/n}“不行，狼领。在芬里斯长大的人都学到了严酷的教训，能嗅到危险。我可以告诉你，这种植物非常邪恶。赶紧把它烧了，一了百了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法带着怀疑的目光，看着那株植物。{/n}“不行，狼领。在芬里斯长大的人都学到了严酷的教训，能嗅到危险。我可以告诉你，这种植物非常邪恶。赶紧把它烧了，一了百了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法急切地凑到你身边，盯着你瞧了半天。{/n}“回到船上之后，你最好找个医生治治耳朵。我刚刚说过了，这是一种危险的寄生生物。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar regarde la plante d'un air incrédule.{/n} « Non, aett-vater. Moi qui suis né sur Fenris et qui ai appris à mes dépens ses dures leçons, j'ai acquis un certain flair pour le danger. Et je vous assure que cette plante est nocive. Brûlez-la, qu'on en finisse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar regarde la plante d'un air incrédule.{/n} « Non, aett-vater. Moi qui suis né sur Fenris et qui ai appris à mes dépens ses dures leçons, j'ai acquis un certain flair pour le danger. Et je vous assure que cette plante est nocive. Brûlez-la, qu'on en finisse. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se penche sur vous et vous observe d'un air inquiet.{/n} « Passez voir le toubib quand vous retournerez sur le vaisseau. Je crois que vous m'avez mal entendu quand j'ai dit que c'était un parasite dangereux. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar blickt ungläubig auf die Pflanze.{/n} "Nein, Aett-Vater! Er, der auf Fenris geboren wurde und dessen harten Lektionen gelernt hat, kann Gefahr riechen. Und ich sage, diese Ranke ist gefährlich. Wir sollten sie verbrennen und gut."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar blickt ungläubig auf die Pflanze.{/n} "Nein, Aett-Vater! Er, der auf Fenris geboren wurde und dessen harten Lektionen gelernt hat, kann Gefahr riechen. Und ich sage, diese Ranke ist gefährlich. Wir sollten sie verbrennen und gut."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar beugt sich nervös über dich und mustert dich mit einem prüfenden Blick.{/n} "Geht zu einem Knochensäger, wenn Ihr wieder auf dem Schiff seid. Ihr habt mich wohl nicht gehört, als ich gesagt habe, dass dieses Ding ein gefährlicher Parasit ist."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, endişeyle üzerine eğilip seni irdeleyen bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İyisi mi gemiye döndüğünde bir doktora görün. Herhâlde bu şeyin tehlikeli bir parazit olduğunu söylediğimde beni yanlış duydun."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar looks at the plant disbelievingly.{/n} "No, Aett-Vater. He who was born on Fenris and has learned its harsh lessons can smell danger. And I say this is a baneful vine. Burn it and be done with it."
